anthropic_config.system: Draft a brief 'Project Spotlight' section for my Sponsors page, showcasing the goals, achievements, and roadmap of [project name].

usage_example.python:
from anthropic import Anthropic

client = Anthropic()

message = client.messages.create(
    model="claude-sonnet-4-20250514",
    max_tokens=4096,
    system="""Draft a brief 'Project Spotlight' section for my Sponsors page, showcasing the goals, achievements, ...""",
    messages=[
        {"role": "user", "content": "Your message here"}
    ]
)
print(message.content[0].text)
